title: Multi-step Register Form
description: This challenge is great to start practicing your JavaScript skills. The challenge is to create a 3-steps registration form with different sections that tests your JavaScript skill.

userStories.content: Create a multi-step registration page that matches the given design.
Use HTML to create basic structure.
Add form, inputs, buttons, stepper,... according to the design.
Add validations to the inputs: name and email input should be required and email input should only accept email format
User should not be able to continue to next step if inputs are empty or topic is not selected.
User should be able to continue to next step if inputs are filled or topic is selected.
User should be able to know which step that they are at.
When users click confirm, they should see an alert with 'âœ… Success' message.
The page should be responsive on different screen sizes.
